result.name: Access
result.description:
Microsoft Access

  • Publish, update, manage, and share data with others via the web-
  • Analyze your information from multiple sources and gain more insights by bringing together all of your data, from spreadsheets to server databases
  • Keep your data secure and compliant with easy data backup and auditing
  • Simplified Expression Builder makes it faster and easier for you to build out logic and expressions in your database
  • Data caching helps ensure that changes made to applications and data while you're offline—including line-of-business information—are automatically synchronized when a connection is restored

result.name: Adobe Acrobat Pro
result.short_description: Create, edit or convert PDF files
result.description:
Adobe® Acrobat® XI software brings you new features to make your day easier. From converting PDF files into editable Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint files to turning existing paper or Word forms into fillable PDF forms, Acrobat XI is loaded with new features to help you:

  • Convert PDFs — Convert PDF files to editable Microsoft Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files
  • Edit PDF files — Make fast, easy edits to text and images directly in PDF files
  • Create fillable PDF forms — Don’t waste time with inefficient paper or Word forms

result.name: Canon imageCLASS Laser Printer
result.short_description: Canon - imageCLASS LBP-6650DN Laser Printer - Monochrome - 2400 x 600dpi Print - Plain Paper Print -
result.description:
Efficient and High-quality Black and White Laser Output

Smart Paper Handling
The LBP6650dn boast print speeds of up to 35 pages-per-minute (ppm) for letter-sized output, and delivers Quick First Prints in approximately 6 seconds. The unit also offers a large paper handling of up to 250 pages in a front-loading cassette and provides duplex output for printing professional-quality documents.

Networkable
The imageCLASS LBP6650dn delivers large-office network capabilities in an affordable compact package. It is networkable over an Ethernet, so everyone can easily share printing capabilities directly from their PC.

result.name: Spigen iPhone 5/5s Case
result.description:
The all-new Slim Armor S is designed for ultimate protection while maintaining its minimalistic look and feel. The redesigned TPU (Thermoplastic Polyurethane) inner lining is softer but delivers better button response and improves impact protection and shock absorption with its strategically designed spider-webbed interior. The also redesigned outer polycarbonate midsection has an improved matte finish coating that offers better grip and feel.

  • Slimmer form-fitted design for the iPhone 5S / 5
  • Two toned colors with a metallic finish
  • TPU case wrapped in polycarbonate outer midsection for extra protection
  • Compatible with Apple Earpods, and earbuds with L-shaped plug (within 6.17mm diameter)

result.name: Brother Network-Ready Color Laser Printer
result.description:
Main Features

  • Fast color output. With a print speed up to 25ppm in both color and black, you no longer hav e to wait for brilliant color output.
  • Easily print two-sided documents. Using the color laser printer's duplex printing feature, you can help reduce your printing costs and produce two-sided documents, presentations and brochures.
  • Built-in Networking. Share the HL-4150CDN with everyone on your network via its built-in Ethernet network interface.
  • Flexible paper handling. Use the 250-sheet capacity paper tray for letter or legal paper. Plus, a 50-sheet capacity multi-purpose tray for envelopes or thicker media.
  • Brother™ iPrint&Scan. Free app download for wireless printing (JPEG, PDF, web page & e-mail) from your Apple®, Android™ or Windows® Phone 7 (JPEG only) mobile device

result.name: Apple Thunderbolt to Ethernet Adapter
result.description: The Apple Thunderbolt to Gigabit Ethernet Adapter lets you easily connect to a high-performance Gigabit Ethernet network. Small and compact, it connects to the Thunderbolt port on your Mac computer and provides an RJ-45 port that supports 10/100/1000BASE-T networks.

result.name: Adobe Creative Cloud
result.short_description: More connected ways of creating and sharing
result.description:
Adobe Creative Cloud brings together all-new desktop and mobile apps, and more connected ways of creating and sharing.

With Creative Cloud, your files, fonts, colors, photos, and even your creative community and collaborators are always at your fingertips. So you can work wherever work takes you.
